description:
For the new year, the staff of Kura all show up to work in kimono. Kiyotaka takes Aoi out to a temple, and they make a promise to visit a cafe together later. But while they`re out, an unexpected reunion will change Kiyotaka and Aoi`s relationship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le sourire de la poupée de porcelaine
